places_titles_dates.description: Transcribe places, titles and dates in historic playbills

tasks.guidance: Transcribe the location of the highlighted performance (e.g. the name of the theatre).

tasks.question: Enter the date

tasks.question: Transcribe the name of the actor
tasks.guidance: Transcribe the name of the highlighted actor (and role, if present).
